entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
